metadata.title: CVE-2017-0433 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Synaptics touchscreen drivercould enable a local malicious application to execute arbitrary code withinthe context of the touchscreen chipset. This issue is rated as High becauseit first requires compromising a privileged process. Product: Android.Versions: Kernel-3.10. Android ID: A-31913571.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
